DOC.criteria: Lifetime nonsmoker FEV1 > 80 % predict value FEV1/FVC > 0.75 Cardiovascular disease use cardiovascular vasoactive drug ; Lung disease use airway drug ( i.e . inhaled corticosteroid , β adrenergic agonist ) ; Respiratory infection 4 week precede study Use systemic glucocorticoid within 4 week study Pregnant nursing female
